songs.title: I’m Like A Bird
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1: Jade & All & Jesy & (Leigh-Anne) & {Perrie}]
You’re beautiful, that’s for sure
You’ll never ever fade
Woah, you’re lovely
Yeah, but it’s not for sure
That I won’t ever change
(And though my love is rare)
{Though my love is true, woah, yeah}

[Chorus: All & Perrie]
I’m like a bird, I’ll only fly away
I don’t know where my soul is, I don’t know where my home is
And baby all I need for you to know is
I’m like a bird, I’ll only fly away
I don’t know where my soul is , I don’t know where my home is
All I need for you to know is

[Verse 2: Jade & All & Perrie]
It’s not that I want to say goodbye
It’s just that every time you try
To tell me, me that you love me, oh
Each and every single day I know
I’m going to have to eventually
Give you away, ay

[Chorus: All & Perrie]
I’m like a bird, I’ll only fly away
I don’t know where my soul is, I don’t know where my home is
I’m like a bird, I’ll only fly away
I don’t know where my soul is , I don’t know where my home is
I’m like a bird, I’ll only fly away
I don’t know where my soul is, I don’t know where my home is
I’m like a bird, I’ll only fly away
I don’t know where my soul is , I don’t know where my home is
Baby, all I need for you to know is

.
